author: Chris
title: “Art 4 Sail” Calling For Design Submissions
text:
“Art 4 Sail” Calling For Design Submissions October 20, 2015 
Masterworks and the Bermuda Sloop Foundation are calling for sloop designs from local artists for their “Art 4 Sail” project. 
A Masterworks spokesperson said, “Sixty fiberglass sail boats have been brought in as empty canvases, ready to be designed and auctioned, with all proceeds going toward Masterworks and the Bermuda Sloop Foundation. 
“Sixty successful applicants will be selected based off of their design and concept, submitted in their application by January 8, 2016. 
“The boats will be delivered at the end of January to those selected; all paint and varnish will be provided by Pembroke Paint, and the boats must be completed and returned to us to auction by the third week of April.” 
Submitting a design can be done via the submission form below, which calls for a design to be done over included outlines, and the provision of information about both the design and the artist behind it. Please contact Masterworks for further information.
